bibl.title: A Papyrus Roll in the Princeton Collection
bibl.note: Diss. Princeton Univ. Roll containing a series of receipts for payments in kind and in money. Philadelphia, 310-324 A.D. - [New edition by R.S. Bagnall and K.A. Worp, ArchPF 1984.]
bibl.seg: Kase Edmund Harris, Jr., A Papyrus Roll in the Princeton Collection.
Diss. Princeton Univ. Roll containing a series of receipts for payments in kind and in money. Philadelphia, 310-324 A.D. - [New edition by R.S. Bagnall and K.A. Worp, ArchPF 1984.]

C.R. par Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 14 (1934) p. 352. - Howard Comfort, AJA 38 (1934) p. 499. - Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 10 (1935) No. 19, pp. 155-156. - Karl Fr.W. Schmidt, PhilWoch 35 (1935) coll. 1970-1971. - Ulrick Wilcken, ArchPF 11 (1935) pp. 313-314.
